a1: Brazil are football, the whole country loves the game.
q2: Will Brazil make it to the World Cup this year?
a2: Well the world cup is over for this year already and yes they made it to the world cup but didn't do as well as people thought they would.
q3: What could they change to have a better performance next world cup?
a3: Brazil needs to practice better teamwork, teamwork over individual player glory.
q4: Is neymar the best brazil player ever?
q5: I think the best player in brazil is pele
a5: Pele is best player, Neymar plays for Paris, anyway.
